mapper.sql: e_journal_id, m_calendar_id, exercise_id, exercise_order, exercise_set, exercise_count, exercise_weight
mapper.select: SELECT ej.e_journal_id, ej.m_calendar_id, ej.exercise_id, ej.exercise_order, ej.exercise_set, ej.exercise_count, ej.exercise_weight, el.exercise_name, el.exercise_image FROM exercisejournal ej JOIN exerciselist el ON ej.exercise_id=el.exercise_id WHERE ej.m_calendar_id=#{m_calendar_id}

SELECT ej.e_journal_id, ej.m_calendar_id, ej.exercise_id, ej.exercise_order, ej.exercise_set, ej.exercise_count, ej.exercise_weight, el.exercise_name FROM exercisejournal ej, exerciselist el WHERE ej.exercise_id=el.exercise_id AND e_journal_id=#{e_journal_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercisejournal (e_journal_id, m_calendar_id, exercise_id, exercise_order, exercise_set, exercise_count, exercise_weight) VALUES(e_journal_id_seq.NEXTVAL ,#{m_calendar_id}, #{exercise_id}, #{exercise_order}, #{exercise_set}, #{exercise_count}, #{exercise_weight})
